
How to launch the netdcd creation

Rscript ./R/netcdf_creation/launching_netcdf_creation.R \
  --path outputs \
  --name majortunasall \
  --dimensions species_label,gear_type_label,fishing_fleet_label \
  --parameter_filtering "species=SBF,YFT,SKJ,ALB,BET" \
  --one_by_species true

Rscript ./R/netcdf_creation/launching_netcdf_creation.R \
  --parameter_filtering "species=SBF;gear_type=09.32;fishing_fleet=JPN,KOR" \
  --path outputs \
  --dimensions species_label
  
  
docker run --rm -it \
  ghcr.io/firms-gta/geoflow-tunaatlas-netcdf-creation-method:sha-457513c3b121 \
  --path outputs \
  --name majortunasall \
  --parameter_filtering "species=SBF;fishing_fleet=FRA" \
  --one_by_species true
